## sl cdn detail

Detail a CDN Account.

### Synopsis

${COMMAND_NAME} sl cdn detail

```
sl cdn detail [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --history int   Bandwidth, Hits, Ratio counted over history number of days ago. 89 is the maximum. (default 30)
```
